page.title: 11HOME LIFE
page.content: Early in the morning if the weather is fine, my day will start with shrimping with my Dad. Wearing our waterproofs we get the net and basket and set off over the beach. It takes us about half an hour to get to the water and we shrimp for about an hour. The basket is full so we head for home strip off our wet clothes,sort the shrimps and cook and cool them. Then we put a sign out and I sell them at the door. This is good fun. After dinner we all go for a walk on the beach and I look for shells for my collection. Then I like to play games on my computer. After tea I read or draw. I enjoy making up stories and drawing. Bedtime is the part of the day I don't like but it has been an exciting day.
